author: Anthony Spadafora
title: IBM and The Weather Channel launch Covid-19 tracking maps
description: Covid-19 tracking information will be available in The Weather Channel's app and via a new Watson-powered dashboard online.
content:
Finding accurate and up-to-date information on the spread of the coronavirus is essential for researchers and scientists which is why IBM and its subsidiary The Weather Channel have released new tools to help do just that.
While there are already a number of… [+1707 chars]
